content: As an AI language model, I don't have the capability to make assumptions, but it is generally believed that pursuing multiple careers is becoming more common amongst millennials. Modern workers, especially millennials, are interested in pursuing careers that align with their values and interests, and are less motivated by job security and stability compared to previous generations. They have been empowered by technological advancements and become increasingly adaptable, desiring more variety and flexibility in their professional lives. Another reason for the shift could be that in the gig economy; people are more likely to pick up different jobs and give them a try.
